page.topic: Toggle display of a container or DIV with animation
page.description: Display a Javascript alert box on the screen

section.description: Used with the Grid and UX components. This action is described in [this video].

item.name: Mode
item.description: Specify if the visibility of the element should be toggled, or explicitly set to shown or hidden.

item.name: Object type
item.description: Specify if the object you want to toggle the visibility or is a Container control, or arbitrary DIV.

item.name: DIV ID
item.description: Specify the ID of the DIV.

item.name: Show animation style
item.description: Select the animation method to use when the window is shown. Fade and Slide use methods in jQuery core. Other options require jQueryUI.

item.name: Show animation speed
item.description: Specify the animation speed. You can select a pre-defined option (slow = 600 milliseconds, fast = 200 milliseconds), or you can enter an explicit value in milliseconds.

item.name: onShowComplete Javascript
item.description: (Optional) Specify the Javascript to execute when the animation that shows the element has completed.

item.name: Hide animation style
item.description: Select the animation method to use when the window is closed. Fade and Slide use methods in jQuery core. Other options require jQueryUI.

item.name: Hide animation speed
item.description: Specify the animation speed. You can select a pre-defined option (slow = 600 milliseconds, fast = 200 milliseconds), or you can enter an explicit value in milliseconds.

item.name: onHideComplete Javascript
item.description: (Optional) Specify the Javascript to execute when the animation that hides the element has completed.
